name: AtlasGame
0:
”Alexa open Atlas Countries Game”
”How to play”
”I play the country Germany”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: atlas countries game
des: Play against the computer with 3 different difficulty levels. Take turns naming countries that start with the correct letter until either you or the computer runs out. The last letter of the last country named determines what the next country's name must start with.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
